name: FIN_ASST_NOTE
description: This table contains information about notes added to financial assistance tracker records.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: ENTRY_PERSON_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date on which this note was created.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in which this note was created.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_SUMMARY
columns.description: A brief summary of the content of this note to aid in note identification.

columns.name: SYSTEM_GEN_YN
columns.description: Denotes whether a financial assistance note was generated automatically by the system.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the internal ID of the financial assistance case record  this note is linked to.
